definitions.example: You've got to admire his persistence. He's asked her out every day for a month even though she keeps turning him down.

definitions.definition: Of data, the property of continuing to exist after the termination of the program.
definitions.example: Once written to a disk file, the data has persistence: it will still be there tomorrow when we run the next program.

definitions.definition: Continuation of the previous day's weather (particularly temperature and precipitation statistics).
